Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
Playstation
<games, hardware> The leading family of {games consoles}, from {Sony Corporation} consisting of the original Playstation (PS1) and the Playstation 2 (PS2).
The basic Playstations consist of a small box containing the processor and a {DVD} reader, with video outputs to connect to a TV, sockets for two game controllers, and a socket for one or two memory cards. The PS2 also has {USB} sockets.
The PS2 can run PS1 software because the PS2's I/O processor is the same as the PS1's CPU.
{Home (http://www.scea.sony.com/playstation/)}.
{FAQ (http://www.flex.net/users/cjayc/vgfa/system/sony_psx.txt)}.
[Dates? Features?]
(2003-07-29)
